caption.p:
Expressions of IKK- α (a), p-IKK- α (b), p-IKK- β (c), NF- κB (d), IL-6 (e), and IL-8(f) protein in the cells were assessed by Western blotting, as a ratio to β-actin. Results were expressed as mean ± SD ( n = 3).
∗
P < 0.05 versus the LPS group, and # P < 0.05 versus the crude AL group of the same concentration.
